alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 11:14PM PST until January 06 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. Snow level at 2500 feet, rising to 6000 feet overnight. Ice accumulations around a one tenth of an inch possible in the Windy River Valley late tonight. * WHERE...South Washington Cascades. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
